title: Don't f*ck with fika!

summary: At least a dozen organizations with domain names at domain registrar Squarespace saw their websites hijacked last week.  Squarespace bought all assets of Google Domains a year ago, but many customers still haven't set up their new accounts.  Experts say malicious hackers learned they could commandeer any migrated Squarespace accounts that hadn't yet been registered, merely by supplying an email address tied to an existing domain
title: Researchers: Weak Security Defaults Enabled Squarespace Domains Hijacks
